  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bioo_es_20070518_2_0030205</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030205</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Los ríos</string>
            <string language="en">Rivers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flüsse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fleuves</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rios</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fiumi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποταμοί</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Se explicam qué es un río y sus tramos, así como los procesos de erosión, transporte y sedimentación que ocurren en ellos.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic explaining what a river is and what its course is like, as well as the processes of erosion, transport and sedimentation which occur in it.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">ríos</string>
            <string language="en">rivers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geología</string>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie Themaerklären, ein welcher Fluß ist und was
sein Kurs, sowie die Prozesse der Abnutzung, des Transportes und der 
Sedimentbildung ist, die in ihm auftreten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expliquer de sujet quel fleuve est et comme ce 
que son cours est, aussi bien que les processus de l'érosion, du 
transport et de la sédimentation qui se produisent dans lui.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Explicação do tópico que rio é e o que seu 
curso é como, as.well.as os processos da erosão, do transporte e do 
sedimentation que ocorrem nele.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spiegazione di soggetto ché fiume è e che cosa 
il relativo corso è come, così come i processi di erosione, di 
trasporto e della sedimentazione che si presentano in esso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που εξηγούν τι ένας ποταμός είναι και τι η 
σειρά μαθημάτων της είναι όπως, καθώς επίσης και οι διαδικασίες
της διάβρωσης, της μεταφοράς και της ιζηματογένεσης που 
εμφανίζονται σε το.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flüsse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fleuves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">géologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">rios</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fiumi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
